citeinfo.title: RIPTA Bus Routes (September 2016); RIPTAroutes0916
citeinfo.othercit: Suggested bibliographic reference: RIGIS, 2016. RIPTA Bus Routes (September 2016); RIPTAroutes0916. Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System, URL: http://www.rigis.org, Environmental Data Center, University of Rhode Island, Kingston, Rhode Island (last date accessed: 9 September 2016).

citeinfo.title: Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System

descript.abstract: Rhode Island Public Transit Authority (RIPTA) statewide bus routes for public transit service with individual route information effective September 2016.
descript.supplinf: It is not the intention when using this data set to determine the exact routing, timing or scheduling of bus trips. Transit system routes and schedules including frequency of service change periodically. Users of this data should check with RIPTA for the most up to data information and not rely on this data for final determinations. Please visit the RIPTA website for official bus stop and bus route information http://www.ripta.com.

idinfo.useconst: This dataset is provided 'as is.â€™ The producer(s) of this dataset, contributors to this dataset, the Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) consortium, the State of Rhode Island, and the University of Rhode Island do not make any warranties of any kind for this dataset, and are not liable for any loss or damage however and whenever caused by any use of this dataset. Please acknowledge both RIGIS and the primary producer(s) of this dataset in any derived products. Versions of the RIGIS logo suitable for both printed and web-based products are available at http://www.rigis.org/logos. RIPTA bus stops, routes, and route number assignments may change with conditions and administrative or managment decisions made after the publication of these data. Users are advised to check the RIPTA website for verification.

attracc.attraccr: Verified by visual inspection of RIPTA schedules, determined to be approximately 99 percent accurate.

dataqual.logic: Complete ESRI ArcGIS shapefile data set
dataqual.complete: Complete to the date of publication as verified by inspection with RIPTA

srcinfo.srccontr: Used as spatial base for roads by which bus routes were located.

procstep.procdesc: Road segments over which bus routes are located were selected from the RIGIS RIDOT roads data set and merged to form a spatial bus route dataset using ESRI ArcView software.
Data contributed to RIGIS by the Rhode Island Public Transit Authority. Metadata were adapted, minor updates made to content, RIGIS distribution information added.

cntorgp.cntorg: University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
